name: Pict-o-matic
tagline: Small jQuery plugin to render pictographs using gliphs from your favorite pictogram webfont
body:
pict-o-matic ============ Small jQuery plugin to render pictographs using gliphs from your favorite pictogram webfont (default to FontAwesome). Probably should be done without jQuery, but javascript is not my poison (usually I drink Python). Fork and send pull requests if you care. Requirements ------------ * jQuery * FontAwesome or similar Usage -----
Population
85%

Result: ![example](/examples/chart.png) Options/Defaults ---------------- * gliph: `` * numGliphs: 10 * fontSize: 0 * width: 'auto' * bg1: 'rgba(207, 207, 207, 0.05)' * bg2: 'rgba(240, 0, 0, 0.05)' * fg1: 'rgb(207, 207, 207)' * fg2: 'rgb(240, 0, 0)' Caveats ------- Don't work in older browsers. I don't care for IE bellow 10, nobody should. Fork and send pull requests if you please.
